head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Hampton Bays: Ground-Breaking For Casino

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Hampton Bays: Ground-Breaking For Casino

body.head.byline: By Tina Kelley (NYT); Compiled by Anthony Ramirez

abstract.p: Shinnecock Indian Nation holds ground-breaking ceremony for planned casino in Hampton Bays, LI, despite restraining order from New York State prohibiting them from building it (S)

block.p: The Shinnecock Indian Nation held a ground-breaking ceremony yesterday for a planned casino, despite a temporary restraining order from the state prohibiting the group from building it, state officials said. Darren Dopp, a spokesman for the New York State attorney general, said that his office had obtained the order because the Shinnecock tribe was not federally recognized and did not have a compact with the state to operate a casino. Two messages left for tribal officials were not immediately returned last night.
